mapper.sql: sys_gas_station_id, gas_station_name, station_level, contact_phone, admin_username, admin_username, email,station_manager, area_id, province_id, city_id, address, longitude, latitude, expiry_date, salesmen_id, salesmen_name, operations_id, operations_name, indu_com_number, tax_number, indu_com_certif, tax_certif, lng_certif, dcp_certif, platform_type, status, created_time, updated_time,prepay_balance,prepay_version,sys_user_account_id,type,map_type,gas_server,LNG_price,promotions,view_count,share_count
mapper.select:
select
from sys_gas_station where type=1 and CONCAT(longitude,",",latitude) = #{xy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select sys_gas_station_id from sys_gas_station where sys_gas_station_id like CONCAT(#{gas_station_province_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by sys_gas_station_id desc limit 1
mapper.delete: delete from sys_gas_station where sys_gas_station_id = #{sys_gas_station_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type <> 0
mapper.insert: insert into sys_gas_station (sys_gas_station_id, gas_station_name, station_level, contact_phone,admin_username, email,station_manager, area_id, province_id, city_id, address, longitude, latitude, expiry_date, salesmen_id, salesmen_name, operations_id, operations_name, indu_com_number, tax_number, indu_com_certif, tax_certif, lng_certif, dcp_certif, platform_type, status, created_time, updated_time,prepay_balance,prepay_version,sys_user_account_id,type,map_type,gas_server ,LNG_price ,promotions ) values (#{sys_gas_station_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gas_station_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{station_level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admin_username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{station_manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expiry_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{salesmen_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesmen_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operations_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operations_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indu_com_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tax_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indu_com_certif,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tax_certif,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng_certif,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcp_certif,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{prepay_balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prepay_version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sys_user_account_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gas_server ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng_price ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{promotions ,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
